text: Hagi anante'ma avanagna zama koana, kresramana vu itamofo tavaonte Ra Anumzamo'a otinege'na kogeno amanage huno nasami'ne, mono nomofo zaza vimago zafaramima noma vazisgama hu'nea zafaramimofo agofetu hankavetinka amasagigeno evuramino fenkama mani'naza vahera zamaheno. Hagi mago'a manisaza vahera magore huza omanigahazanki bainati kazinteti zamahe'nuge'za fri vagaregahaze.
